Row.Text: Promising Student

A promising young student has recently come to our attention. Well-versed in the mathematic sciences, the student would do well in the service of our government. We should find a place for them.[NEWLINE]
He should be put to use in the Military.
He should be put to use in Communications.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]All current Military Units gain +5 XP[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]All current Military Units gain +1 Sight[ENDCOLOR]
We have employed a promising student into the military.
We have employed a promising student into communications.
Züriputsch

A conservative coup d'etat against the liberal government of Zurich has taken place! The conservative leaders in charge of the coup have pledged to overthrow any and all governments that would threaten the current religious order. We need to deal with this matter before it spreads throughout the country.[NEWLINE]
We must have the perpetrators thrown in jail!
We should concede to whatever demands the conservatives want.
We should pay all those involved off.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]The city of Zurich undergoes two turns of [ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]The [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital undergoes one turn of [ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[ENDCOLOR]
We have thrown the perpetrators of the Züriputsch into jail, causing unrest amongst the conservatives of Zürcih.
We have conceded to the demands of the conservatives, causing unrest in the capital.
We have bribed everyone involved in the Züriputsch, settling all disputes for the time being.
A coup d'etat has occured in the Swiss city of Zurich.
